pr_title: [eclipse/xtext#1777] ported more xtend code to java & cleanup

timeline.bodyText: The JavaDoc for inner classes needs a to be fully qualified (but '.' instead of '$')

replies.bodyText: Most likely a bug in Xtend
replies.author: szarnekow
